value.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect. Can be used to store Apparel. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 4 Stack per tile: 2 Allowed items: Apparel

A triple-stack shelf that holds three times as much as empty ground. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Since shelf space is limited, shelves cannot hold chunks, buildings, plants and large corpses. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 6 Stack per tile: 3 Allowed items: Foods, Manufactured, Raw Resources, Items, Weapons, Apparel, Corpses

A small triple-stack shelf that holds three times as much as empty ground. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Since shelf space is limited, shelves cannot hold chunks, buildings, plants and large corpses. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 3 Stack per tile: 3 Allowed items: Foods, Manufactured, Raw Resources, Items, Weapons, Apparel, Corpses

Increases work speed when placed near a workbench. One workbench can use up to two tool cabinets. This structure can also be used to store goods and valuables. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 6 Stack per tile: 3 Allowed items: Metals

ThingDef.label: file cabinet
ThingDef.description: A piece of furniture used for organising documents and records in paper form. It will help you perform research tasks faster. This structure can also be used to store research items. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 6 Stack per tile: 6 Allowed items: Techprints, Tech Subpersona Core, Neurotrainers, Signal chips, Empire Intel, Research papers

ThingDef.label: royal dresser
ThingDef.description: A luxurious dresser, adorned with solid gold and elegant in design, making nearby beds more comfortable.Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect. Can be used to store Apparel. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 6 Stack per tile: 3 Allowed items: Apparel

ThingDef.label: royal wardrobe
ThingDef.description: A grand, gold-trimmed wardrobe designed for nobility. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one royal wardrobe near the same bed has no effect. Can be used to store Apparel. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 8 Stack per tile: 4 Allowed items: Apparel

ThingDef.label: wardrobe
ThingDef.description: A tall wardrobe for storing clothing and other items. Gives a small sleep effectiveness bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one wardrobe near the same bed has no effect. Items stored inside will not deteriorate over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 6 Stack per tile: 3 Allowed items: Apparel

value.description: A small plinth with an artistic imagery carved into the sides. Can be used for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 1 Stack per tile: 1 Allowed items: Weapons

A small-size pieces of pottery with artisting engravings. Can be crafted on a crafting spot. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 6 Stack per tile: 6 Allowed items: Food, PlantMatter

li.xpath: Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFE_DrugCabinet" or defName="VFE_MachiningCabinet" or defName="VFE_SmithyCabinet" or defName="VFE_TailorCabinet" or defName="VFE_FabricationCabinet"]
Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFE_DrugCabinet" or defName="VFE_MachiningCabinet" or defName="VFE_SmithyCabinet" or defName="VFE_TailorCabinet" or defName="VFE_FabricationCabinet"]

value.description:
Increases work speed when placed near a drug lab. One workbench links up to two drug cabinets. Can be used as storage. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 8 Stack per tile: 4 Allowed items: Medicine, Plant Matter, Cloth, Neutroamine 

<color=#0094FF>Items stored can be frozen when powered.</color>

Increases work speed when placed near a fabrication bench. One workbench can link up to two fabrication cabinets. Can be used as storage. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 8 Stack per tile: 4 Allowed items: Advanced Components, Components, Metals

Increases work speed when placed near a machining table. One workbench links up to two machining cabinets. Can be used as storage. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 8 Stack per tile: 4 Allowed items: Steel, Components 

<color=#0094FF>Items stored can be frozen when powered.</color>

Increases work speed when placed near a smithy. One workbench links up to two smithy cabinets. Can be used as storage. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 8 Stack per tile: 4 Allowed items: Metallic

Increases work speed when placed near a tailoring table. One workbench links up to two tailor cabinets. Can be used as storage. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 6 Stack per tile: 3 Allowed items: Textiles, Leathers

An illuminated dresser, adorned with light strips. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds, whilst lighting up the room. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect. Can be used as storage. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 8 Stack per tile: 4 Allowed items: Apparel

A sleek, modern wardrobe with an integrated soft-glow lamp. Gives a small comfort and rest effectiveness bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one wardrobe near the same bed has no effect. Can be used as storage. \n\n<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 10 Stack per tile: 5 Allowed items: Apparel
